bibl.title: Una maniera insolita di recuperare i papiri.
Archiv für Papyrusforschung und verwandte Gebiete

bibl.note: During the excavations carried out in 2015 at Tebtynis, inside the Soknebtynis temple, many hieratic, demotic and Greek fragments, some of them substantial, were found in mice nests. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Claudio Gallazzi, Una maniera insolita di recuperare i papiri.

During the excavations carried out in 2015 at Tebtynis, inside the Soknebtynis temple, many hieratic, demotic and Greek fragments, some of them substantial, were found in mice nests. - Avec résumé en anglais.
